website_summaries.verdict: One hair dryer with smart ergonomics in its design. Comfortable to use with extreme portability.
pros: Simple controls provide 3 heat and 2 speed settings
Out of the way so you won't change settings accidentally
Ionic and ceramic heating elements help to smooth out wet hair
cons: Some times dies prematurely and unexpectedly

customer_reviews.title: Started to melt
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer worked for a little while but I noticed that it has started to melt. This is a fire hazard. I'll definitely be tossing it and getting a better hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sparked within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Update! Disregard my past review. This dryer has started sparking. It didn’t even last 6 months. I do not recommend. Old review: My teen loves this dryer so far. It heats up and blows well. Not weak. If you’re funny about the power and heat then you will know what I’m talking about. We like a strong flow and hot heat. Thinking of purchasing one for myself since my other brand just went out.
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyMom

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Seems are not sealed in right, still worked though, the diffuser chipped and I didn't even drop it, and it's a lot heavier than I thought it would be. This was bought for the gym so I can get ready before work. The price was right but the product quality isn't up to par. I'll try to get my money's out of it until it's completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Curlz

customer_reviews.title: Dry it up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ungrateful, rude sister. I hope the 1875 watt dryer cooling setting. Cools her ass off.
customer_reviews.author: Faustina Welch

customer_reviews.title: Dryer itself seems to work just great. No complaints there
customer_reviews.text: Dryer itself seems to work just great. No complaints there. But the cord is very short. It means you either need an extension cord, or sit on your outlet. Unfortunately, I'm finding that no one advertises how long their cords are. Length matters! :-)
customer_reviews.author: marissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Genuinely surprised at how well this blow dryer works. I was able to use a coupon and get it for around $9 so I wasn't expecting much in terms of it being high quality. But after using it a few times on my thick, coarse, wavy/curly hair I am very pleased with this purchase. I use it on medium heat and it dries my hair quickly. Can't ask for much more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dallyce.

customer_reviews.title: My fave
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my yellow hair dryer seemed to be the 3-4 year old version of this one. That one started making a weird noise, so I figured it was time for a new one. I’m very impressed how long the old version lasted. This one is just as great but the blow speed is even better and it doesn’t ever take a few seconds to cool down during use which the old one did. Love how quickly it dries my thick curly hair into a shiny sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: Aggy Beekay

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, very good airflow and temperature regulation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer in August 2018 because my previous one stopped working. I like the medium size and the airflow and heat options. I have fine but very full hair. With the high air flow setting my hair dries quicklyhighest of the. The three heat settings and separate cold air button allow for plenty variation for every hair type. The temperature on the highest setting is comfortably warm but not hot like with other hair dryers. Also even on the high airflow setting this unit is not too loud and it does not have the annoying high pitch sound that a lot of other hair dryers have.
customer_reviews.author: G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Developed an intermittent electrcal connection after just over a year of daily use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine dryer but it developed an intermittent connection after just over a year of daily use that made it unusable. It seems that flexing the electrical cord caused the wire to break inside the insulation so that it only made contact when the cord was flexed in a certain way. This is the third dryer that I have bought that develops a similar problem in only year or so. It seems that these dryers are only designed to last that long. Does anybody know of a dryer that will last longer?
customer_reviews.author: BARDofM

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old revlon dryer with this because of reviews. This is junk. The temperature does not stay consistent no matter which heat setting you choose. The two speeds are also a joke. The one is like it is barely on and the other is like a windstorm. My hair just ends up in knots. Maybe the one shipped to me was a dud, who knows. I am suprised this has any positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy! Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: 0 stars! It's a simple hair dryer only problem is that it doesn't get hot! The first time I used it everything worked fine. The second time I used it I tried the cold shot button and now the dryer doesn't heat up at all! I don't know what happened...maybe the cold button got stuck? I've had dryers that work for 10 years and this one is dead the second time I use it. It takes forever to dry my hair with cold only air...so frustrating. This dryer is total trash
customer_reviews.author: Knc

customer_reviews.title: Great Settings!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use a hair dryer often because my hair gets frizzy and huge if I do but this one has changed the game for me! The temperature and speed settings really help me get the right temperature to not damage my hair. The diffuser is a great addition, helps me dry my hair in minutes! The color is also very nice and makes it easy to find in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: ginamarie

customer_reviews.title: worst hair dryer ever
customer_reviews.text: bought this on July 2018 and used it literally 10 times. The power cord set on fire while I was using it in my bedroom and my bed almost got on fire too!!! Be aware people of this dangerous crap!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've never used this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the product information on Amazon gave the dimensions of this dryer, but it's big. Or I should say it's as big as the one I wanted to replace. My old one still works fine after 20 years of use, but I wanted something smaller so it would fit in my original, tiny Art Deco bathroom. Frankly, regardless of the new "Ceramic + Ionic + Tourmaline Technology" I think it's shameful that Remington did not slim down the size. It's a waste of material. With the COVID-19 distraction, it's too late and too insignificant to return. I'll donate it so it doesn't go to waste--everything's good.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name #1

customer_reviews.title: 3 MAIN PROBLEMS MAKE THIS DRYER ANNOYING and UNUSABLE
customer_reviews.text: 1) Only SPEEDS are: LOW (VERY low, would take long time to dry) or HIGH (very high, cannot control wind power); and 2) Has the 2-button SECURE ON/OFF that REGULARLY SHUTS blower off where I cannot get it to start again until I push buttons frequently. 3) LARGE PLUG COVERS BOTH plug outlets in my bathroom, making me unplug/replug my other permanent appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover from HB

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: When our old hair dryer was showing signs of old age, we decided to buy a replacement before it died completely. We looked for one that was a bargain, but good quality. This definitely surpassed our expectations. Not only did it dry our hair quickly, but it was quieter than our previous unit, has more settings, and the filter can be cleaned. But this is what truly impressed us: our hair is SMOOTHER and SHINIER after using this dryer! We highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gail A.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a little bulky, so I wouldn't use it for traveling unless you've got space. I definitely love it though! The attachments are a big benefit. Works really good. I have thick shoulder length hair and it had it dry fast. The different speeds and the different heat settings are killer! I
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: updated after use
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand. Very powerful yet light weight. Definitely my favorite dryer of all I've owned. ======================== Wrote the above when I first got it. After 3 months, the case cracked right at the inner corner, explosing some wires. I probably should have sent it back, but that's such a pain the butt. I slapped some electrical tape on it and continued. It's now at the 11 month mark and it's just plain falling apart. I really liked the power and feel of the thing, but durability will make me not by another.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Branham

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! But wouldnt turn on 6 months later.
customer_reviews.text: Pro: LoVE that you can turn the heat all the way down so that its virtually just cool air. I dont like using heat on my colored hair. So this was perfect! Con: 6 months later my hair dryer won't turn on at all. I'm really upset about this. It just died. And I only blow dry mine or my daughters hair once every week or 2. So it wasnt over used.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Foster

customer_reviews.title: Nice daily hairdryer. Snug attachments. A+
customer_reviews.text: Great for daily use. The attachments stay on well (they don’t keep falling off like my last hairdryer). I wish the cool button wasn’t right under my fingers when using/holding the dryer. My fingers keep hitting it. Dries my long thick hair straight or curly. Works well so far!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Hill

customer_reviews.title: Almost Lasted 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: Was a great hair dryer until recently. Had to put her down. She sounded like a jet engine starting up...neighbors started complaining, almost ended my relationship...once I realized it could possibly start a fire, I had to put her out of her misery.
customer_reviews.author: Tara A

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using this affordable hair dryer. It stopped working after 1.5 years though.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hair dryer!!! It has great setting options, it's a lot quieter than my old hair dryer and the attachments it comes with are cool. I don't know about the whole "ionic smoothing" thing it advertises - I think that might be b.s. - but it doesn't get super hot so your hair doesn't get as badly damaged. Either way, I really like it and it's my favorite color. Big win all the way around. UPDATE: So I've had this hair dryer almost a year now and it will works fantastically. There is no damage to it or my hair. I still love it and think it was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena H

customer_reviews.title: I like this hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this hairdryer. I don't think it's quieter than all the other hairdryers I've had. 3 temperatures (high, med, low) and 3 different levels (high, med, low) are nice. First time I've had the option of different temperatures. I have super thick hair and never had a problem with too much heat, but this would be a great buy if you hair damages easily with heat. Great price range for the quality that it is.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLam

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money! Non-returnable
customer_reviews.text: It looks cheap and works as well. 1. It sounds too loud 2. It’s too long so not comfortable 3. You cannot use MAX speed because hair fly apart, but middle speed almost useless So the thing almost useless at all but when you find it out it would be too late because item non-returnable. It is a waste of money! Buy something more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Good for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: This dryer has been wonderful for my curls! I love that it has a cool air setting and is lightweight and easy to hold. I took a star off because it's not super powerful (it takes around 30-40 mins to almost completely dry my hair) however it's much faster than air-drying so I'm happy with it. This is the first time in my life I've been using a diffuser to dry my curly hair and it's been a great beginner's experience!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. My old hair dryer would take about 10 minutes to dry my hair after a shower. I later found out the model had already been discontinued, so I thought it was time for a new one. This one is great. It dryes my hair in about 3 minutes and i have hair that reaches past my shoulder blades. It blows good hot air, but the outside purple plastic parts are completely safe to touch. They hardly get warm even after I use it on the highest setting, so your fingers won't get burned.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a diffuser and I’m so mad I haven’t been using one all along. Worked great the first time drying my thick/curly/dry hair. Got an air-dry look in 15 mins with minimal frizz, when it would take several hours to actually air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Handle causes you to press buttons that takes the heat away
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at this hair drier for the price. A purchase that made my life much easier. It is powerful and adjustable. However, the button to make the heat cool down is located in the middle of where you grip the handle!!! It makes it extremely annoying to use. I can kind of work around it, but it's a mild inconvenience that haunts me every time I the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have curly hair. I need a diffuser that works well because I use it very often. The diffuser included falls off easily if you put the slightest amount of pressure on it. I tried to use the diffuser I was using previously. The shape of this blow dryer makes it slide off. So now I am stuck with this diffuser that came with the blow dryer. I have it duct taped on so it won’t come off. What a pain.
customer_reviews.author: MaryT

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until today
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until today. Had it almost a year. This week it had been making weird noises and this morning it blew and caught on fire. Regrettable purchase. Will spend more money next time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hair. And now, I have a hairdryer with both the heat and the volumetric capacity to make quick work of getting rid of excess moisture quickly after a shower. And scalability too. 3-speeds, so I can blow really hard, or really soft. And 3 temperatures too. I like that flexibility. The dryer is lightweight too. Comes with a GFI-type plug-in too for extra safety. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Hair Dryer in a Lovely Shade of Purple
customer_reviews.text: I've stuck with this blow dryer for years. I normally let my hair air dry to avoid damage, but I use this dryer when I want to add more volume or after I wash my hair and need to straighten it immediately. For the price point and how infrequently it's used, it's been a decent product. The diffuser does pop off easily and I've had to buy a new one since the inner part can break upon hitting the floor, thus making it unable to attach flushly to the nozzle of the blow dryer. Besides that, it's worked efficiently and I love the purple color!
customer_reviews.author: Lady of the Lake Placid

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser prongs are short not ideal for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the purpose of the diffuser attachment, for curly hair. I'm using it while on travel in San Francisco because I forgot to pack my dryer which is a Revlon. While the Remington dries fairly well, the prongs on the diffuser are short, and few. This didn't help keep my curls intact which creates more frizz. I'll keep it because it's good enough but not great. I recommend the Revlon which is actually cheaper as well.
customer_reviews.author: adg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT blow dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this blow dryer when my other one died. I was leary about not being able to actually hold it before buying it. But, reading the reviews I went ahead and ordered it. I am so glad I did! It's lightweight, pretty color, and I can't believe how fast my hair dries! I have curly hair and I LOVE the diffuser! My hair is not frizzy at all. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anna O.

customer_reviews.title: Ok hair dryer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for a hair dryer I have a Revlon hair dryer that the max het went out and is vary difficult to clean I always have my cats on my bed and i use the hair dryer to warm up my feet and the hair ends up in it. This hair dryer is easy to clean which I love I just use a cotton swaps that to use for your ear works vary well
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Trueblood

customer_reviews.title: A good hair dryer for basic hair drying
customer_reviews.text: The hair dryer is not as lightweight as some other products from Remington. Also, I think that the medium fan power is more toward a high level. The medium heat is relatively hot to me, as well. The working sound is acceptable and comparable to higher-end products. However, you should look for more advanced products if you are going to use a hairdryer fo salon or professional use. Overall, this model looks like a reasonable basic hair dryer for home use to me which is a good one considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vahid N

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is great for getting the job done quickly and effectively. It has 3 different heat settings as well as 3 different speeds. Once you have your hair dry and are ready to style it you can use the cool burst button to blow cool air over your style to lock it into place and help it hold all day. Another benefit is that using this hair dryer reduces friction and frizzy hair that you normally get when drying with a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Wethers

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot
customer_reviews.text: This dryer should only be a travel dryer as it tangles my hair more then dries it. It is light white so it is good for anyone That needs a light white dryer but it is not a good quality dryer it just flies your hair around with very little heat and a lot of air and also makes my hair look very dry. I have used very good dryers and dryers that are not as expensive like this one and never had one as bad as this. I cannot recommend this dryer it as really reminds me of the ones that are in the hotels that are left unused because of The unkept way it leaves your hair looking.
customer_reviews.author: PetMom

customer_reviews.title: Big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new dryer with diffuser. This is not a lightweight dryer. So if you have weak wrists this isn't a good choice. The diffuser part is huge and broke when I tried to attach it to the dryer. When I wiggled the dryer it made my bathroom light shake. Dryer is big. I went to a beauty supply store and bought a different dryer that us lightweight with same output.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D.

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE !!!  CAUTION !!!  READ DESCRIPTION !!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT RETURNABLE ! I hate it , I cant return it . It says so in the description ,I just didn't look. I won't be snookered again . Feel like amazon got one over on me . Never felt like they would be sneeky like this but who wants to buy something online that's NOT RETURNABLE. Guess I'll start going back to the store more often .
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and worth every cent, excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - 3 Heat ( kind of cool, medium heat and HOT) + 2 Speed Settings (low is great and high will blow like a hurricane) + Cool Shot (Perfect). Very well made and bonus attachments are great. Cons - none for me, I love it, but it is a full size unit so traveling with it might be cumbersome. Nutshell - this is a great hair dryer and the cost is exceptional. It does everything I need and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DML 59

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this hair dryer! I have thick hair so it always takes forever to dry my hair but this makes it faster. I also love the additions it came with. Definitely worth buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I expected but lighter to compensate - works great!
customer_reviews.text: Still getting used to it, but REALLY like the results. My normally fly-away, hair is tamed by the Remington dryer. It's larger than expected so taking some time to get used to; fortunately, it's lighter than my smaller dryer, so extra size isn't too much of a problem. Could be a little unwieldy if you have small hands, or plan to travel with it. Beyond that--it's great to smooth my normally wavy, unruly hair. It's the results that count!
customer_reviews.author: LinDee Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product is worth the money. Dries hair fast without damaging it. The 3 airflow settings help a lot as well as the 3 heat settings. The only con is that the cold air button cannot be locked and needs to be held on to.
customer_reviews.author: Aswath Mohanan

customer_reviews.title: Are use it but not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Are use it but not a fan Are use it because I can get away with it having very short hair but I’m not a great fan of this particular blow dryer. It takes a little while for the heat to really come up and I have never had that problem before with the blow dryer. Like I say because I have very short hair it doesn’t make much of a difference but if I had long hair or even medium length hair I probably get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Inlow

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting a salon quality hair dryer, but after reading the reviews I thought it would at least dry my hair. It took twice as long, my hair wasn't shinier or smoother. The motor is weak, it's not powerful and not good for straightening anything but the thinnest of hair. Don't believe the hype. It's a sub $20 hair dryer and that's exactly what you will get. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amber MoralesTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: This WOULD be the best hair dryer I've ever used if the temperature part ...
customer_reviews.text: This WOULD be the best hair dryer I've ever used if the temperature part wasn't screwed up. This dries my hair really fast which I love, but I leave it set on the warmest setting and it goes from warm to cold to REALLY cold, to warm, to cold, etc. for the entire 10 minutes it takes me to dry my hair. Weird and unfortunate but I'm keeping it because even still, it's better than the last blow dryer I had.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer. The back of my other old one came off and kept pulling out my hair. I also decided that I wanted to give my hair a break from heat from a hair dryer and flat iron. So I now plop my naturally curly hair over night and use the diffuser in the morning to finish drying. It gives off the perfect amount of air so my curls don’t get frizzy. And low heat is actually low heat!!
customer_reviews.author: Sje1979

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my hair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair dryer!! Has different settings and is very powerful. I have thin fine hair and it dries my hair within 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hairdryer. True, there are fancier and more professional ones that might serve your purpose if you have particular needs. However, I found this to be more than sufficient. It has several speeds and temperatures, and the two extensions were helpful for providing, respectively, more focused and more diffuse drying power. Lightweight, easy to transport, and powerful. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I researched for hours because I have very long, thick hair and I can’t stand having to dry it for a long time. I’m loving this dryer—it’s light, powerful, has a nice grip and location of controls, and it is not too loud. The fact that it is SO inexpensive is just icing!!!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Good hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Love the slim and light weight of this hairdryer. Color is pretty. Delivery is fast. I’ve dropped it a few times and it has not chipped. The only downside is that the attachments after wear and tear don’t stay on. But if you don’t need the attachment the hairdryer is fine by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyov5

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Love this hair dryer! I was looking for a better "cheap" blowdryer and this one does it! I've got thick hair and get get my hair dry within 10 min using this. Plus it leaves more of a shine and less frizz!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Mattsen

customer_reviews.title: Great heat setting
customer_reviews.text: I love the three options of heat settings. It fits my needs perfectly so that I could first use the strongest setting to do a quick dry in the scalp. Then I could use the medium heat to thoroughly dry my hair. The cool setting is for style. A nice feature to have. I have long hair so it helped me to solve the problem perfectly within desired amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: hy533

customer_reviews.title: Very long and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hairdryer because it was on sale for a very good price. However, I wish I had spent more and got one that was shorter and more lightweight. It is hard for me to hold onto with one hand and style my hair with the other because of the weight. Won't take it traveling with me as it is to big. My mistake, but it won't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair drying!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I haven't had a blow dryer in years. Don't use much heat on my hair. But this is not only my favorite color but it gets the job done on my 4c hair. I am not using it to straighten my hair just drying and detangle.
customer_reviews.author: HardCayndae

customer_reviews.title: Have had this for over a year, using it ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for over a year, using it almost daily. It's still working well! I usually use the low-heat and no-heat settings, with the high fan setting. This dryer makes it much easier to style hair than some of the others I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarcube101

customer_reviews.title: Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these years ago and my teenager took it so I bought another one because once u find a hair drier you like you must keep it. They change so often. I’m glad Amazon still had this exact one. I don’t use the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Desi Conner

customer_reviews.title: No longer safe to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last September and I haven’t used it continuously because I often let my hair go curly. I’ve been very happy with it when I have used it. This morning when I turned it on, it made a horrible noise, then spit out a piece of black plastic. I don’t feel safe using it anymore, which is a shame because it was a nice little hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Peach pie

customer_reviews.title: Great for diffusing!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is extremely versatile, it gets REALLY HOT and can stay VERY COOL depending on how you want to use it (blowouts or diffusing). It's definitely made from an inexpensive plastic, but what you buy is what you get. It's lightweight which I appreciate since I have to hold it for diffusing. I will say that the diffuser extension is not the best I've ever had since it doesn't have holes in the prongs, only on the base, but it gets the job done. It's not super small but also not large, so I think it could be packed easily.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Way nicer than expected
customer_reviews.text: this blow-drier is way nicer than I expected for the price! The attachments are better quality and larger than I anticipated. I bought this because of the attachments that came with. Specifically the defuser. I wasn't expecting much at this price, and yet I'm pleasantly surprised! GREAT value! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loves all the attachments it has, and how it has different heat settings. She does not like to damage her hair, so she loves that it has a cool setting and low. She loves the color, too. Overall, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Socha

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2017 and after 3 years of regular use it started to not dry as well and smelled funny. I liked it and it worked well for me so I ordered a second one. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Random Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the power and the affordability
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Remington blow dryer. I keep buying this brand because I know I can trust that the model I choose, will be both affordable and will work for a long time. This one is relatively quiet and impressively high powered. I’m very happy to spend considerably less time drying my long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Holdridge

customer_reviews.title: Recomend
customer_reviews.text: Great blow dryer. Would buy again. Better then the 50$ one I bought at Ulta
customer_reviews.author: Jellybeanqueen

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: So, I’ve had this blow dryer for almost 3 years - it still dries my hair very well but....just over the past 3 days it has been emitting a highly toxic, plastic smell🤢 So, now I am no longer using it for health reasons😑 Not sure why it is doing this - not overheating and cleaned the filter on the back🤷🏼‍♀️ Guess I got my $20 worth of use out of it after 3 years, though
customer_reviews.author: Angie H Spies

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dryer! It not only does the job I require with all the settings I need but there is less frizz after I use it. I have recently cut my hair into a medium length bob and this dries it in no time at all. I have arthritis so I have rigged up a holder so I can use it hands free. I just bend my head down and flip my hair over and brush it while it dries. Works great! I love the color too, a beautiful purple but not garish. Great price for a great dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: I have thin, long (waist length), wavy to straight hair and this dryer works amazing! I was hesitant at first because of the reviews but I decided on purchasing anyway. It takes about 20 minutes for all of my hair to dry because of length but after use my hair feels super soft. It did not damage or burn my hair even on highest heat setting and power. I usually use the cool setting afterward to lock the hair cuticle after I use the heat and it was more of a luke warm current. Otherwise, it does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: December 2019 Very good lightweight hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: Our old dryer had been acting up for some time, but was usable and we were going to go on vacation so we needed to replace our hair dryer. Looked at a lot of hair dryers on line and some when we were at stores, and there's really too many to look at. Did a narrowed on-line search and found this one and some others. We liked the features and pulled the trigger. It's been working great, we took it on vacation and we have no complaints. The old one is at the dump.
customer_reviews.author: G. FREE

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Good size. Great attachments. It blow dries very well! Great product for a good price. Not the most hard bowing hair dryer but I am okay with that. I feel like the heat is a perfect temperature to where it won’t burn my hair. Still dries great! Love it. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser falls off easily
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this dryer for a month, but I'm already looking to replace it. The diffuser falls off repeatedly throughout the drying process--very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Medusa in Akron

customer_reviews.title: Even Better Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I wasn't expecting much for the price, but I've had this for a few months now and I'm very happy. The construction is solid, not flimsy, but also not heavy and bulky. It's easy to take the nozzle attachments on and off and when they're on, they stay firmly on. The settings work well, the whole thing is reliable. Thank you, seller! My bangs and cute hairdo send their love.
customer_reviews.author: MetroHippieMama

customer_reviews.title: works great a little hard to hold without changing settings
customer_reviews.text: works great a little hard to hold without changing settings - I want to hold the handle where the switches are and tend to change the settings while drying wish they were in a different spot or handle was longer so I could grasp handle.
customer_reviews.author: bernadette bustillos

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, you will not be disappointed💋
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer. Its worth the money and more. I love that it has all the features that an expensive professional dryer has for much, much less. My hair fluffs up and it shines and its not as loud as I anticipated. Finally an affortable worthy hair dryer👍👍👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser kept falling off
customer_reviews.text: The diffuser part kept falling off when using and eventually it fell and cracked so I can no longer attach it. This happened maybe a week after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: kellyzimmer0109

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: So I have mixed thoughts on this hairdryer... Not very impressed with it. The hot setting isn't very hot which therefore takes my hair longer to dry. Also not a lot of power and I keep finding I'm pressing on the "cool" button the way I hold it which is annoying. I may have to look for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I never take the time to write reviews. But, this dryer is too good not to write about. My last hair dryer cost about $300. I had it for years. Things have come a long way. This dryer was so low priced, I thought I might as well try it. It blasted air so hard I literally laughed. My hair was dry in no time. There is no reason why everyone should not quit searching and just buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good.. however..
customer_reviews.text: The blower so far works well. It's not hot at all but it's powerful. Very light weight. I am disappointed for the package. It arrived during a heavy rain evening and the original box without any plastic wrap or envelope was left on my porch under the pouring rain.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love! Quality for the price is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: For the price- I’m blown away (pun intended) My old blowdryer (of 12 years died finally) and I had no idea what I was missing in that decade. I can now dry my thick and long hair in 1/4 of the time, my hair doesn’t look super frizzy when I’m done AND my arm isn’t getting a workout from holding a clunky dryer for 20 minutes! I’m loving this product and the price, say what?! I’m tempted to order another for our RV!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Daubenberger

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: High powered and gets hair dry quickly. The lowest setting is still pretty powerful. This hair dryer is pretty big and would be tough to pack for a trip. So far it is holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Too big to go traveling with but great for at home.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fold or anything, so I dunno why anyone would bring this traveling with them. I've had this for over a year now, and it still works great, I never use the 2 extension parts cause my hair is just straight with nothing fancy attached to them. 5 stars cause it has endured over a year of just me using it and then shoving it into the bottom of my sink.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first hair dryer purchase. I spent a good amount of time looking up the most bang for your buck dryer and this one kept popping up on reddit. It has several useful attachments that make my mornings much easier. You could definitely spend more on a hair dryer, but if your like me and just need the product to work.... this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Abegg

customer_reviews.title: Weak motor.
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews said this hairdryer has a lot of power, but it does not. The motor fan is very loud and slow. It took forever to dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quiet hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as her old one was extremely loud and sounded as though it could explode at any moment. I'm no expert but i read the reviews compared similar products and bought this one. My wife says she likes it and that is works great. This product seems to be as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Can’t attach the diffusers.
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to attach the diffuser which is why I bought the dryer. I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: janice cronin

customer_reviews.title: Protect your ears & hearing; this is amuch better product
customer_reviews.text: Great overall dryer with accessories. Best thing is that the pitch of the air blowing through is at lower decibels. This hair dryer is far superior to our last one which was more expensive / professional. The problem with the old dryer: TOO LOUD. PROTECT YOUR EARS! Avoid future tinnintus This is a much better product.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Buttons in bad location
customer_reviews.text: I found this hair dryer to be heavier than I prefer and past hair dryers. I don't particularly notice it to be better than past hair dryers I've used and it's easy to accidentally hit the buttons that change heat setting and low high. I find myself constantly fighting with the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Dryer but short cord.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this hair dryer for 2 weeks but it is great. I really like the 3 different heat settings and the different speed settings are nice too, dries my thick hair faster than my old hair dryer. The only negative thing is the cord is too short. It needs to be at least a foot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic dryer for the money
customer_reviews.text: I don’t need a special dryer for my straight, fine hair. It takes 7 min to dry including the 2-3 min I spend on my annoying bangs. I wish this got a little hotter. Has the removable filter cap and the nozzle & diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: ChiShopper

customer_reviews.title: Strong but poor button placement
customer_reviews.text: I like this hairdryer other than the “cool” button is right where you would hold it at normally. So I’ve had to learn a different way to hold my hair dryer unless I want to dry my hair with cold air the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Nice dryer but does not get hot enough.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dryer but it really doesn't get hot enough. I use a hair dryer to style my bangs and it has to be hot enough in order for it to work . This dryer is not. If you are just using it to dry...it's fine. To style...get something with more heat.
customer_reviews.author: Winterblues

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really good diffuser for my natural 4c hair. Not too harsh
customer_reviews.author: Yes Honey!

customer_reviews.title: Parts don’t attach
customer_reviews.text: I had the same blow dryer for many years and was sad when it finally bit the dust. I purchased this dryer and it seemed great until I tried to attach the concentrator which I always use. I tried every way possible but to no avail, it’s as if it belongs to another dryer. Wanted to return but had major surgery the following day and have been highly medicated and bed ridden. Doesn’t anyone check these things before boxing them up? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Hidden Gem! I love this hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hairdryer is so powerful! I bought one a while back on a cyber monday sale without reading reviews and I am very impressed! It doesn't lose power over time and dries my hair in 5 minutes :) every woman in my family now owns one. Very much worth the affordable price tag! Give it a try! I do wish it came in more color options, but I don't mind purple either.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed & Pissed off🤬🤬🤬🤬
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use my blowdryer. I plugged it in and it got on fire after almost a minute... What happens now with with my 2 year warranty??
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair without excess fizz
customer_reviews.text: I like that I could control the temperature and it feels like a mixture of cold and hot air that hits my hair. Does a great job of drying my hair without damage. Light in weight. It's a great hairdryer.
customer_reviews.author: Himesama808

customer_reviews.title: This dryer worked fine for a budget dryer - multiple speeds and heat ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hair dryer to replace my previous Revlon hair dryer. This dryer worked fine for a budget dryer - multiple speeds and heat settings were important to me because I like to use medium heat and end with a cool go-over. The cord is nice and long. I haven't been using it that much since I recently cut my hair really short but I feel good having this in case I ever need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: JustLookAtTheFlowers

customer_reviews.title: Attachments do not stay on the hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to use with the diffuser. However, it does not snap in so the diffuser falls off immediately if you move the hairdryer - which is what one does when blow-drying hair. I had to purchase another hairdryer. Don't waste your money if you plan to use the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: tt100

customer_reviews.title: nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t say this is .. lightweight per say. It has some weight to it. As for the dryer itself, unless it’s on heat there’s no way you’re drying your hair in an hour. expect like five hours. even if you swap the setting to level 1-2 heat there’s a significant difference. also the diffuser piece was a bit weird to attach, and this is only my first couple of times using so I can’t imagine how it is after months/years of use. you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Bobe

product_meta.title: Remington D3190 Damage Protection Hair Dryer with Ceramic + Ionic + Tourmaline Technology, Purple
product_meta.description: Achieve shiny, healthier hair* with the REMINGTON Damage Protection Hair Dryer. The Advanced Coating Technology offers 3X more protection* during styling, and our proprietary Micro-Conditioner Technology keeps your hair healthier*. This dryer combines Ceramic + Ionic + Tourmaline technologies with 1875W max power for fast, healthy styles and less frizz*. With three heat and two speed settings, you can find the airflow performance you prefer for your hair type. Then lock in your gorgeous styles with the cool shot button. Plus, the concentrator and diffuser attachments make it easy to style with precision or build volume and lift while you dry your hair. *vs. standard Remington dryer.
feature_bullets: Damage Protection Hair Dryer for Shiny, Healthy Hair
3X More Protection with Advanced Coating Technology
Healthier Hair with Proprietary Micro Conditioner Technology
Ceramic + Ionic + Tourmaline Grill for Faster Drying with Less Frizz

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
